subject: Breeders' Cup World Thoroughbred Championships
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Trainer Patrick Biancone agreed not to appeal a one-year suspension for violating Kentucky drug rules after prohibited items, including cobra venom, were found in June in his barns.
snippet: Trainer Patrick Biancone agreed not to appeal a one-year suspension for violating Kentucky drug rules after prohibited items, including cobra venom, were found in June in his barns.
